remarks: Value of a function given by ordered-pair class abstraction. (Contributed by Jeff Madsen, 2-Sep-2009.)  (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 11-Sep-2015.)
statement:
fvopab6.1 $e |- F = { <. x , y >. | ( ph /\ y = B ) } $.
fvopab6.2 $e |- ( x = A -> ( ph <-> ps ) ) $.
fvopab6.3 $e |- ( x = A -> B = C ) $.
fvopab6 $p |- ( ( A e. D /\ C e. R /\ ps ) -> ( F ` A ) = C ) $.
$d A x y $.
$d B y $.
$d C x y $.
$d ps x y $.
